cells.text: The estimated rate of future increases in the per capita cost of health care benefits is 7.5% in 2013, decreasing by 0.5% per year to 5% in 2018 and

cells.text: beyond. This estimate reflects the Company’s current claim experience and management’s estimate that rates of growth will decline in the future.
